ygData.subject: Re: A time, 20 million years ago
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron opened up the enrgon bars. He grited his teeth, at the site of all the Decepticon terrorists, deposed by Gauntlet Prime. The smell of stagnating fuel

References: <9f1cqq+f14s@...> <00e901c0e91a$b538e480$10929cd1@pavilion> <3B15A448.52C1@...> <3B15BB5F.51BE@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron opened up the enrgon bars. He grited his teeth, at the site of
all the Decepticon terrorists, deposed by Gauntlet Prime. The smell of
stagnating fuel burned his optics. He was about to turn away from the
dead soldiers, when a glint caught his eye. He waded into the
deactivated robots, and undug a robot, who's eyes still glinted, but
never functioned to this day.
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Megatron snapped out of the past, he walked up to Perceptor, and
attempted to put his hand around the Predacons throat.
